text:
Hi Sir

If i use yahoo's website or even apache's the things are working fine but when 
I load test my web application which is using turbine/velocity/hibernate 
framework

the html encoding says "this application requires IE 5.5 or higher " ...rather 
I am using IE 6.0 and the things are fine at browser end..

But when I try to load test then thru JMeter..it returns following message.

I tried with both jdk1.4 and jdk1.5 version
Help asap

thanks and regrads
~ Kiran
